LanguageData.DMS_Drone_VerlingBrid.label: Verling bird
LanguageData.DMS_Drone_VerlingBrid.description: A quad-drone built for reconnaissance. It is quite fragile in combat but moves extremely fast. It can be equipped with a small-caliber gun or grenade to provide combat capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Drone_VerlingBrid.tools.head.label: head
